entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts, mentioned as being absent.

entities.name: phineas nigellus
entities.description: A wizard and a great-great-grandfather of Harry Potter, mentioned in a portrait.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Harry's godfather, who is dead but not known to Phineas Nigellus.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, trapped in a room with portraits.

relationships.description: Dumbledore sent a message to Phineas Nigellus.
